pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to the CSDP Semidefinite Programming Library // R interface to the CSDP semidefinite programming library. Installs version 6.1.1 of CSDP from the COIN-OR website if required. An existing installation of CSDP may be used by passing the proper configure arguments to the installation command. See the INSTALL file for further details.
